name: Ancient Wonders: Pharaoh's Tomb
description:
The falcon has flown to the skies and his successor arises in his place. The Pharaoh is dead and It's time to finalize the preparation of the Tomb at the Valley of the Kings.
It falls upon you to decorate it in honor of the Pharaoh! Play through more than 100 levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Tomb of the Pharaoh!

Key Game Features

More than 100 hex-match-3 link style!
Variety of puzzles such as collapse, jigsaw and spot the difference!
Decorate the Pharaoh's Tomb
Game Modes to choose from!
